channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sea shares dip by over 8% as profit comes in below analyst expectations
item.description: Sea’s operating expenses rose 28% in the past quarter, with its e-commerce arm—Shopee—looking to strengthen its competitive edge over rivals.

item.title: Reagan-appointed judge resigns in protest of Trump, warns of president's 'assault on the rule of law'

item.title: The Shutdown Was Pointless and Dumb
item.description: The real reason for the shutdown? It was a way for progressives to give vent to an unreasoning hatred of Donald Trump.
